name: Tab_GetCustomTab
description: Retrieves information about the requested custom tab on the specified account.

accountId.description: The external account number (int) or account ID GUID.

customTabId.description: The DocuSign-generated custom tab ID for the custom tab to be applied. This can only be used when adding new tabs for a recipient. When used, the new tab inherits all the custom tab properties.

$ul: **anchor**: An optional string that is used to auto-match tabs to strings located in the documents of an envelope.

**anchorCaseSensitive**: This property controls how [anchor tabs][AnchorTabs] are placed. When **true,** the text string in a document must match the case of the `anchorString` property for an anchor tab to be created. The default value is **false.**
**anchorHorizontalAlignment**: This property controls how [anchor tabs][AnchorTabs] are aligned in relation to the anchor text. Possible values are :
**anchorIgnoreIfNotPresent**: When **true,** this tab is ignored if the `anchorString` is not found in the document.

**anchorMatchWholeWord**: When **true,** the text string in a document must match the value of the `anchorString` property in its entirety for an [anchor tab][AnchorTab] to be created. The default value is **false.**
**anchorUnits**: Specifies units of the `anchorXOffset` and `anchorYOffset`. Valid units are:
**anchorXOffset**: Specifies the X axis location of the tab in `anchorUnits` relative to the `anchorString`.
**anchorYOffset**: Specifies the Y axis location of the tab in `anchorUnits` relative to the `anchorString`.
**bold**: When **true,** the information in the tab is bold.
**collaborative**:

**concealValueOnDocument**: When **true,** the field appears normally while the recipient is adding or modifying the information in the field, but the data is not visible (the characters are hidden by asterisks) to any other signer or the sender.
**createdByDisplayName**: The user name of the DocuSign user who created this object.
**createdByUserId**: The userId of the DocuSign user who created this object.

**customTabId**: The DocuSign generated custom tab ID for the custom tab to be applied. This can only be used when adding new tabs for a recipient. When used, the new tab inherits all the custom tab properties.

**disableAutoSize**: When **true,** disables the auto sizing of single line text boxes in the signing screen when the signer enters data. If disabled users will only be able enter as much data as the text box can hold. By default this is false. This property only affects single line text boxes.
**editable**: When **true,** the custom tab is editable. Otherwise the custom tab cannot be modified.
**font**: The font to be used for the tab value. Supported fonts include:
**fontColor**: The font color to use for the information in the tab. Possible values are:
**fontSize**: The font size used for the information in the tab. Possible values are:
**height**: The height of the tab in pixels.
**includedInEmail**: When **true,** the tab is included in e-mails related to the envelope on which it exists. This applies to only specific tabs.
**initialValue**: The original value of the tab.
**italic**: When **true,** the information in the tab is italic.
**items**: If the tab is a list, this represents the values that are possible for the tab.
**lastModified**: The UTC DateTime this object was last modified. This is in ISO 8601 format.
**lastModifiedByDisplayName**: The User Name of the DocuSign user who last modified this object.
**lastModifiedByUserId**: The userId of the DocuSign user who last modified this object.

**locked**: When **true,** the signer cannot change the data of the custom tab.
**maxNumericalValue**:
**maximumLength**: The maximum number of entry characters supported by the custom tab.
**mergeField**: Contains information for transferring values between Salesforce data fields and DocuSign tabs.
**allowSenderToEdit**: When **true,** the sender can modify the value of the `mergeField` tab during the sending process.
**allowSenderToEditMetadata**: Metadata about a property.
**options**: An array of option strings supported by this setting.
**rights**: Indicates whether the property is editable. Valid values are:
**configurationType**: If you are using merge fields, this property specifies the type of the merge field. The only supported value is `salesforce`.
**configurationTypeMetadata**: Metadata about a property.

**rights**: Indicates whether the property is editable. Valid values are:
**path**: Sets the object associated with the custom tab. Currently this is the Salesforce Object.
**pathExtended**: Reserved for DocuSign.
**pathExtendedMetadata**: Metadata about a property.

**row**: Specifies the row number in a Salesforce table that the merge field value corresponds to.
**rowMetadata**: Metadata about a property.

**rights**: Indicates whether the property is editable. Valid values are:
**writeBack**: When **true,** data entered into the merge field during Signing will update the mapped Salesforce field.

**paymentItemCode**: If the custom tab is for a payment request, this is the external code for the item associated with the charge. For example, this might be your product id.
**paymentItemDescription**: If the custom tab is for a payment request, this is the description of the item associated with the charge.
**paymentItemName**: If the custom tab is for a payment request, this is the name of the item associated with the charge.
**requireAll**: When **true** and shared is true, information must be entered in this field to complete the envelope.
**requireInitialOnSharedChange**: Optional element for field markup. When **true,** the signer is required to initial when they modify a shared field.
**required**: When **true,** the signer is required to fill out this tab.
**scaleValue**: Sets the size of the tab. This field accepts values from `0.5` to `1.0`, where `1.0` represents full size and `0.5` is 50% of full size.
**selected**: When **true,** the radio button is selected.
**shared**: When **true,** this custom tab is shared.
**signatureProviderId**: Reserved for DocuSign.
**stampType**: The type of stamp. Valid values are:
**stampTypeMetadata**: Metadata about a property.
**options**: An array of option strings supported by this setting.
**rights**: Indicates whether the property is editable. Valid values are:
**tabLabel**: The label associated with the tab. This value may be an empty string.

**type**: The type of this tab. Values are: Approve, CheckBox, Company, Date, DateSigned,	Decline, Email,	EmailAddress, EnvelopeId, FirstName, Formula, FullName,	InitialHere, InitialHereOptional, LastName, List, Note, Number,	Radio, SignerAttachment, SignHere, SignHereOptional, Ssn, Text, Title, Zip5, or Zip5Dash4.
**underline**: When **true,** the information in the tab is underlined.
**validationMessage**: The message displayed if the custom tab fails input validation (either custom of embedded).
**validationPattern**: A regular expression used to validate input for the tab.
**validationType**:
**width**: The width of the tab in pixels.

$block: This object describes errors that occur. It is only valid for responses and ignored in requests.

$ul: **errorCode**: The code associated with the error condition.
**message**: A brief message describing the error condition.
